title: Wolf Squared
description: This is an oil painting of a wolf, done on stretched canvas. The wolf is depicted as powerful and noble, standing tall and proud against the backdrop of stormy clouds. The painting is signed by the artist and would make a great addition to any collection of animal art. It would also be perfect for anyone who loves wolves or nature in general.
category: giant wolf in space

title: HOWL
description: This uniquely beautiful oil painting is of a wolf, the howl being one of the most primal and moving sounds in the animal kingdom. Captured in breath-taking detail, this painting will add a touch of wild magic to any room. The perfect addition to your move decor, it also makes a great gift for any nature lover.
category: giant wolf in space

title: First Try
description: Introducing a new way to learn history and art. This children's oil painting features a simple but informative view of the ancient Egyptian pyramids. perfect for the first time artist, this kit comes with all the tools needed to complete the project, including a full color instruction booklet
category: a painting of the pyramids surrounded by forest

title: Lush
description: This is an oil painting art work by a 15 year old. It is of a beautiful view of the pyramids, surrounded by a forest. It is a great piece of art for anyone who loves Egypt or ancient history. The artist's name and age are printed on the back of the painting.
category: a painting of the pyramids surrounded by forest

title: Now including for a limited time only: Smaller Pyramids!
description: This is an oil painting on canvas of the smaller egyptian pyramids. It has a very stylish and modern look, and would be a great addition to any home. The painting is done in high quality, with great attention to detail. It would look great in a kitchen, dining room or living room.
category: a painting of the pyramids surrounded by forest

title: Oil Spill
description: This is an oil painting that commemorates the terrible BP oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico. The painting shows the majestic pyramids surrounded by a beautiful forest, which has been poisoned and destroyed by the black sludge from the oil spill. The artist has used vibrant colors to create a moving and powerful piece of art.
category: a painting of the pyramids surrounded by forest

title: Big Bite of Brie
description: Salvador Dali's Big Bite of Brie is a surrealist oil painting of a cow eating cheese. It is a perfect addition to any art lover's home and makes a great conversation starter. The painting is 24x36 and comes ready to hang on your wall.
category: surrealist oil painting by Salvador Dalí of a cow eating cheese

title: Last Bite
description: This magnificent Salvador Dali painting, Last Bite, is a must-have for any art lover or cheese fanatic. The painting depicts a cow eating a large hunk of cheese, with an expression of pure ecstasy on its face. The bold colors and surrealist style make it a unique addition to any home.
category: surrealist oil painting by Salvador Dalí of a cow eating cheese

title: First Taste
description: This is an oil painting by surrealist artist Salvador Dali of a cow eating cheese. It is a signed and numbered lithograph that has been printed on high quality paper. The dimensions of this print are 19.7 inches x 26.4 inches.
category: surrealist oil painting by Salvador Dalí of a cow eating cheese

title: Opportunity
description: This is a one-of-a-kind opportunity to purchase a piece of art by Salvador Dalí. This oil painting, Opportunity, is a surrealist masterpiece that captures the whimsy and humor of the artist. Painted in 1951, it is one of Dalí's earlier works and is highly sought after by collectors.
category: surrealist oil painting by Salvador Dalí of a cow eating cheese

title: OBSIDIAN
description: Obsidian is a 3D render of a magical deer. It is the perfect addition to any home that wants to add a touch of magic to their decor. The beautiful, ethereal deer can watch over your family and protect them from harm. It is the perfect decoration for a child's room, or for anyone who wants to bring a little magic into their lives.
category: a 3D render of a magical deer

title: VIOLET
description: Add a touch of magic to your kitchen with this beautiful, life-like deer mug! This mug is perfect for anyone who loves spending time in the kitchen. The soft colors and enchanting design will make you feel like you're in a fairy tale every time you use it. The mug is made of high-quality porcelain and is dishwasher and microwave safe. It's also freezer safe, making it the perfect choice for serving cold drinks on hot days.
category: a 3D render of a magical deer
